objectives: Retire by age 60 (John) and 57 (Sarah) with a combined income of $120,000 p.a. (today's dollars)
Pay off the family home mortgage within 5 years
Build the SMSF to $2,000,000 by retirement
Ensure adequate insurance protection for the family
Minimise tax through the trust structure
Fund children's education (private school fees ~$35,000 p.a. per child)
